title: Season Match 2
description:
The fairytale kingdom reigned by Snow Queen and three princesses of seasons in turn has been seized by Prince January. All the castles are trapped in ice and snow. At every level of this game you are to find a magical artifact guarded by its guard. The fairytale that links the levels together provides a strong plot, the absence of which could weaken a good game.
